General.Name: Kopy Goldfields AB (publ)
General.Description: Kopy Goldfields AB (publ) engages in the exploration, development, and production of gold. The company holds 14 exploration and production licenses with a total license area of 2,159 km2 located in the Lena Goldfields area of the Irkutsk region in Siberia. Its flagship project is the Krasny project, including the Krasny, Krasny alluvial, and Batiy bedrocks with a total area of 117 km2. The company was formerly known as Kopylovskoye AB and changed its name to Kopy Goldfields AB (publ) in June 2011. Kopy Goldfields AB (publ) was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.
